mapper.insert: insert into db_table_index(table_id, index_type, index_name, is_unique, column_name, column_position) values (#{tableId}, #{indexType}, #{indexName}, #{isUnique}, #{columnName}, #{columnPosition})
mapper.select: select t.table_name tableName, i.index_name indexName, i.is_unique isUnique, i.column_name columnName, i.column_position columnPosition from db_table_index i, db_table t where t.id = #{tableId} and t.id = i.table_id order by i.column_name, i.column_position
mapper.delete: with tables as (select t.id from db_table t where t.db_id = #{dbId}) delete from db_table_index i using tables where i.table_id = tables.id
